summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Единый Портал Управления Отделами - Corporate faction management platform. All 21 backend API tests passed. Frontend UI testing completed successfully with all major features working.

integration_issues.issue: FIXED - Dashboard was using xhrApi which caused Mixed Content errors. Changed to use api.js with relative URLs

critical_code_review_comments: Dashboard.js was using xhrApi which caused Mixed Content issues - FIXED by switching to api.js
xhr-api.js utility has potential Mixed Content issues when used - consider removing or fixing
seed_data_creation: Test data created during API tests with TEST_ prefix (departments, topics)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features tested and working: Login, Dashboard with 8 factions, FSB faction page with 3 departments, Department table with employee attendance tracking (Был/Не был), Topics management (lectures & trainings), Audit log with action history, Settings page with user info and theme toggle, Tables page with current week display. Mixed Content issue was fixed by changing Dashboard.js to use api.js instead of xhr-api.js.

features_tested.login_flow: PASS - Login with vadim@emergent.dev / admin123 works correctly
features_tested.dashboard_8_factions: PASS - All 8 factions displayed (Правительство, ФСБ, ГИБДД, УМВД, Армия, Больница, СМИ, ФСИН)
features_tested.fsb_faction_navigation: PASS - FSB faction page loads with 3 departments
features_tested.department_table: PASS - Table shows employees with attendance tracking (Был/Не был) for lectures and trainings
features_tested.topics_management: PASS - Lecture topics (УК РФ, КоАП, ФЗ, УПК, Устав) and training topics (Закрепление, Доверс, Писпен, Обыск) displayed
features_tested.audit_log: PASS - Action history displayed with timestamps, users, actions, resources, and IP addresses
features_tested.tables_page: PASS - Current week (02.02 - 08.02) displayed with department tables
features_tested.settings_page: PASS - User info (Vadim Smirnov, vadim@emergent.dev, Разработчик role) displayed
features_tested.theme_toggle: PASS - Dark/Light theme toggle works correctly
features_tested.sidebar_navigation: PASS - All sidebar links work (Главная, Фракции, Отделы, Таблицы, Лекции и Тренировки, Журнал действий, Настройки)

api_endpoints_tested.GET /api/: PASS - API root returns status operational
api_endpoints_tested.POST /api/auth/login: PASS - Login with valid credentials returns tokens
api_endpoints_tested.GET /api/weeks/{id}/table-data: PASS - Returns table data for week
